They have their own home in San Miguel, in the department of San Miguel. Jose works as farm hand in a cattle farm. He also cultivates his own fields, growing corn and sorghum every year. He learned the business from his father when he was very young.  Jose wishes to build a small house and he requests a loan to purchase wood, cement, and steel rebars. With this investment, he and his family will have a larger home from where to live with their children in greater comfort. 

His goal is to improve their quality of life. Working to make his dream a reality is the driving force behind his motivation.

loans.use: To purchase wood, cement, and steel rebars.

loans.name: Vaneza

texts.es: Vaneza tiene 21 años, vive con sus padres en la propiedad que tienen. Desde hace 2 años se dedica a realizar bordados y prendas típicas, que son características de su zona, en este caso son los fustanes, las prendas que realiza y hecha de tela con variados bordados y colores. Este trabajo lo realiza con su maquina, que le ayuda hacer finos acabados. Es así que después de una jornada semanal de producción distribuyen al por mayor a los comerciantes, asimismo realiza el servicio de costura, actividad por el cual recibe considerables ganancias que la favorece en su economía y la anima a planear el futuro de su negocio implementando con mejores equipos y herramientas. Es su crédito número 3  con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos y agradece  a todas las personas que serán gestoras del crédito que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de una maquina de coser nueva.
texts.en: Vaneza is 21 years old and she lives with her parents on the property they own. For the past 2 years she has been making cross-stitch crafts and traditional garments that are common in the region, especially skirts. The articles of clothing she crafts are made in various colors and patterns. She works with the help of a machine that crafts the fine designs. Following a week's worth of production she distributes her crafts in wholesale to merchants. She also provides sewing services, a business that affords her a considerable income. This helps her personal finances and it encourages her to plan to improve her business in the future with better tools and equipment. This is her third loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is very happy to know she has this financial support. She has always demonstrated to be responsible with her payments. She is thankful to all those individuals who will contribute to the loan she requests. It will be very useful in the progress of her business. The loan she requests will be invested in the purchase of a new sewing machine.

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase tools.

loans.name: Hardworking Mothers Group

texts.es:
El comité Mamás Trabajadoras nació mediante la gestión y el apoyo de otro comité que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar.
Se fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas y las de sus respectivas familias.
La Sra. Gloria Belén C., presidenta del grupo, tiene 31 años, ella es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora y por sobretodo muy optimista.
texts.en:
The group name Mamas Trabajadoras, meaning Hardworking Mothers, was started with the guidance and support of another group who works in the same location. 

Their principal goal is to stimulate the development of each one of the members and their respective families.

Mrs. Gloria Belen Caceres is the leader of the group. She is 31 years old and she is an enterprising and hardworking woman who is, above all, very optimistic.

loans.use: To purchase sugar, pastas, meat, milk, breads, rice, cooking oil, flour, corn, onions, and fruits.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José Santos, tiene 36 años de edad, reside en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 12 y 6 años de edad, administra una tienda que inicio hace 11 años, con iniciativa propia, la tiene ubicada en su casa de habitación por eso no tiene un horario fijo para atenderla.

Actualmente esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería como aceite, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, jabón, papel higiénico, entre otros productos, con esta inversión ella crecerá con el negocio, administrando más productos, atendiendo mejor la demanda de los clientes, y recibiendo ingresos estables para su familia.

Su objetivo es tener un negocio fuerte, capaz de atender la demanda de los clientes, velar por las necesidades del hogar y principalmente de sus hijos.
texts.en:
José Santos is 36 years old.  He lives in Jucuapa, in Usulután department, with his wife and two children aged 12 and 6.  José runs a store that he set up 11 years ago on his own initiative.  His business is located in his home so he doesn't work regular hours.

José is currently requesting a loan so that he can buy merchandise such as oil, sugar, rice, beans, soap, toilet paper and other products.  This investment will help him make progress in his business, sell more products, better meet his customers' demands and make a stable income for his family.

José's goal is to have a strong business, to be able to meet his customers' demands and to take care of the needs of his household, mainly those of his children.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as oil, sugar, beans, soap and toilet paper

loans.name: Rosa Digna

texts.es:
Rosa, de 31 años de edad, reside en Santiago de María departamento de Usulután, se dedica a la venta de productos plásticos, vive con su esposo y su hijo de 6 años de edad, el negocio lo inicio hace 2 años, lo atiende en el mercado municipal de 5:00am a 6:00pm.
Ella esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos plásticos como guacales, sillas plásticas y Valdés, con los fondos del préstamo espera adquirir todos estos productos a mejor precio para ponerlos a la venta y obtener una mejor ganancia.

Su aspiración es fortalecer el negocio cada vez más, que sus ingresos mejoren y dedicarle el tiempo necesario a su familia, ayudando a sus hijos y mejorando la condición de vida de ellos.
texts.en:
Rosa is 31 years old.  She lives in Santiago de María, in Usulután department, with her husband and 6 year-old son.  Rosa has been selling plastic products for 2 years.  She sells her products in the town market from 5.00am to 6.00pm.  Rosa is requesting a loan to buy plastic products such as  crates, chairs and buckets.  She hopes to use her loan money to acquire all these products at a better price so that she can sell them and make better profits.

Rosa's goal is to further strengthen her business, to improve her income, to dedicate enough time to her family, to help her children and to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To buy plastic products such as plastic crates, plastic chairs and buckets

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es:
María, resiD. en Berlín, departamento D. Usulután, tiene 33 años D. edad, administra una tienda, ella vive con su esposo y dos hijos D. 16 años y un año D. edad, poseen casa propia. El negocio es una tienda que inicio hace 10 años, esta instalada en su propia casa, no tiene un horario fijo.
Ella esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería como aceite, azúcar, jabón, entre otros, que los clientes le solicitan, con esta compra espera tener para los clientes lo necesario para los hogares, además D. contar con su preferencia.
Sus aspiraciones es que su negocio sea más rentable, con ganancias abundantes, para mejorar su sistema D. vida.
texts.en:
33 year-old María lives in her own home in Berlín, in Usulután department, with her husband and two children aged 16 and 1.  She runs a store that she set up 10 years ago.  The store is located in her home and she doesn't work regular hours.

María is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as oil, sugar, soap, etc. that her customers are requesting from her.  By making this purchase, she hopes to have available everything her customers need for their households.  She also hopes to gain their loyalty.  Maria's goals are for her business to become more profitable, to make good profits and to improve her way of life.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as oil, sugar, soap, etc.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia tiene 31 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en casa de sus padres. Desde su niñez ha estado ligada a las actividades agrícolas, en la actualidad cría animales como  vacas, cerdos y ovejas que vende  periódicamente en la feria ganadera de su ciudad. Su esposo también vende  junto con ella y ambos  ofrecen al público  los animales que disponen. Le agrada desarrollar su negocio porque le permite tener ganancias más estables que le ayuden a sostener económicamente a su familia, por tanto su deseo es tener variedad de animales y de buena raza. Es su séptimo crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de remedios para sus animales.
texts.en:
Sonia is 31 years old and lives with her husband and two children in her parents' home.  Sonia has been working in agriculture since she was a child.  She currently raises animals such as cows, pigs and sheep that she sells periodically in the livestock market in her city.  Her husband also sells with her and they both sell their animals to the public.  Sonia likes carrying out her business as it allows her to make stable profits that help her to financially support her family.  For this reason, her wish is to have a variety of animals and for these to be good breeds.

This is Sonia's seventh loan with MFP.  She is happy to know that she has financial support.  She has always been responsible in making her repayments.  Sonia likes being part of her community bank because all the members are responsible people who are very supportive of each other.  She is grateful to those who will help fund her loan as it will be very useful to her in making progress in her business.  She will invest her loan in buying medicine for her animals.

loans.use: To buy medicine for her animals

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Don Manuel, reside en Jucuapa, departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 17 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de panes Hot Dog, el negocio fue por iniciativa propia hace 11 años, y su horario es de 8:00am a 8:00pm, el atraviesa una situación de escases de dinero para invertir en el negocio, por lo que solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales como: mortadela, salchichas,  mayonesa, papel, toallitas, y refrescos.
Este préstamo le ayudara a adquirir todo lo necesario para continuar con sus ventas, así mismo estará atendiendo a los clientes ofreciéndoles los hot dog con todos los ingredientes.
Su aspiración es tener un lugar fijo donde realizar la venta con la intensión de mejorar sus ganancias, y estabilizar su condición económica y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel lives in Jucuapa, in Usulután department, with his wife and 17 year-old son.  His business is selling hot dogs.  He set up his business 11 years ago and he works from 8.00am to 8.00pm.  Right now, Manuel does not have enough money to invest in his business and, for this reason, he is requesting a loan so that he can buy supplies such as bologna, sausages, mayonnaise, paper, napkins and soft drinks.

This loan will help Manuel to acquire everything he needs to continue making his sales.  He will be able to serve his customers hot dogs with all the trimmings.

Manuel's goal is to have a fixed spot where he can make his sales, so that he can improve his profits and stabilize his family's financial position.

loans.use: To buy bologna, sausages, mayonnaise, paper, napkins and soft drinks

loans.name: Marlene Del Transito

texts.es:
Marlene, tiene 33 años de edad, reside en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután, tiene un chalet, vive en casa propia con su hija de 6 años de edad, él chalet está ubicado al interior del centro escolar, lo inicio por sus propios medios, trabaja de lunes a viernes de 6:00 am a 5:00pm, de este negocio ella recibe los ingreso diarios para cubrir las necesidades del hogar.
Ella actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para compra embutidos, gaseosas, jugos, agua, pan, galletas, dulces entre otros que son necesarios para ofrecer a los estudiantes.
Este préstamo le ayudara ya que no dispone de ahorros para realizar la inversión e iniciar con el negocio en este año escolar que va a iniciar. Su propósito es velar por que el negocio este en las mejores condiciones para no perder a la clientela que son los jóvenes estudiantes y los profesores, también su deseo de superar con su familia es lo que cada día tiene presente.
texts.en:
Marlene is 33 years old and lives in her own home in Jucuapa, in Usulután department, with her 6 year-old daughter.  Marlene has a snack bar which is located inside a school.  She started the business with her own money.  She works from Monday to Friday, from 6.00am to 5.00pm and through her business she makes the daily income she needs to cover the needs of her household.

Marlene is currently requesting a loan to buy sausages, soda, juice, water, bread, cookies, candy and other products that she needs to be able to offer the students.

This loan will help Marlene since she doesn't have the necessary savings to make this investment and therefore would not be able to re-start her business during the coming school year.  Her goal is to make sure that her business is in the best condition possible so that she doesn't lose customers.  Her customers are the young students and the school teachers.  She also wishes, every day, to get her family ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy a range of products such as soda, juice, water, bread, cookies and candy

loans.name: Lisbeth Maria

texts.es: Lisbeth tiene 37 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijas que se encuentran en edad escolar  ella se dedica al comercio aproximadamente dos años actualmente tiene una bodega ubicada en su domicilio adicionalmente el padre de sus hijas le pasa una pensión mensual,el financiamiento otorgado sera destinado para sacar su0 licencia de conducir, se le otorga el financiamiento por contar con buenas referencias,voluntad y capacidad de pago.
texts.en:
Lisbeth is 37 years old.  She is a single mother who lives in her own home together with her four school-age daughters.  Lisbeth has been in the sales business for approximately two years.  She currently has a grocery store located in her home and her daughters' father provides her with a monthly allowance.

Lisbeth will use her loan money to get her drivers license.  She is being given this loan because she has good references and both the desire and ability to repay the loan.

loans.use: Drivers license

loans.name: Ana Deysi

texts.es:
Doña Ana, tiene 44 años de edad, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, residen en Chinameca departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a vender tortillas, negocio que tiene ubicado en su casa, ella inicio con su propia iniciativa hace 6 años, tiene un horario de trabajo de 10:00am a 3:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz y leña, con este préstamo le ayudara en la compra de materiales para realizar las ventas de tortillas, su intención es mejorar su producción realizando más para dar abasto a la demanda y aumentar la clientela.
El objetivo de doña Ana es tener el negocio por un largo tiempo, ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, juntos trabajar por mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ana is 44 years old.  She lives with her husband and two children in Chinameca, in San Miguel department.  She owns a tortilla business which is located in her home.  Ana started this business through her own initiative 6 years ago and she works in her business from 10.00am to 3.00pm.

Ana is requesting a loan to buy corn and firewood.  This loan will help her to buy the supplies she needs to sell her tortillas.  She intends to improve her production, producing more in order to meet demand and increase her customer base.

Ana's goal is to have her business for a long time and to help her husband with their household expenses.  Both Ana and her husband work so that they can improve their children's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn and firewood

loans.name: Heriberto Abraham

texts.es:
Heriberto tiene 43 años de edad, casado, con una familia de cinco hijos, su negocio que tiene es propio, un pequeño taller de soldadura en donde tiene diecisiete años, laborando en este pequeño negocio. Iniciando en un taller de empresa privada, en donde capto más experiencia, lo que lo impulso a sobre salir adelante.
Hoy desea aumentar la producción de soldadura,  ya que hace los trabajos de verjas, puertas, todo en el ramo de soldadura. También trabaja por contratos a empresas en donde gana su dinero fijo.
Con este préstamo, que es por medio de financiamiento, siendo Afodenic quien dará un giro al  aumentar la producción de su trabajo, comprando los materiales siguientes: diez tubos redondos, tres quintales de hierro liso, dos quintales de hierro liso de mayor grosor, entre otros a utilizar. Lo que espera captar más clientes y mejorar sus utilidades
texts.en:
Heriberto is 43 years old, married, and has five children.  He owns his own business which is a small metal shop.  He has been in this small business for seventeen years, having started out in the workshop of a private company where he gained experience which motivated him to get ahead.

Heriberto would like to increase his metalwork production since he makes gates, doors and everything else in the field of metalwork.  He also works on contracts for companies.  This is where he makes his regular money.

Heriberto will use this loan from Afodenic to increase his production, buying the folllowing: ten round pipes, three 100kg lots of thick, smooth, iron and other materials he uses.  He hopes to attract more customers and improve his profits.

loans.use: To buy more raw materials to make metalwork

loans.name: Lidia Marina

texts.es:
Doña Lidia tiene 69 años de edad,  reside en Berlín departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposo ya que sus hijos viven en sus propios hogares, doña Lidia administra una tienda que nace por iniciativa propia hace 30 años, está instalada en su propia casa, esto no le permite tener un horario definido para atender a los clientes.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar aceite, azúcar, jabón, pastas, pan, entre otros productos que son necesarios para el negocio, con esta ayuda del préstamo estará reduciendo la posibilidad de caer con la tienda, y atenderá mejor a los clientes con diversidad de productos para el hogar.
Los sueños y aspiraciones son administrar un negocio fuerte, capaz de atender a muchos clientes y mejorar su condición económica y familiar.
texts.en:
Doña Lidia is 69 years old and lives in Berlín in the department of Usulután.  She and her husband live alone since their children now live in their own homes.  Doña Lidia runs a store out of her house that she started 30 years ago.  This makes it difficult for her to have a fixed schedule to attend to her customers.  

She is requesting a loan to buy oil, sugar, soap, pastas, bread and other products that she needs for her business.  This loan will help to keep her store open and to better serve her customers with a diversity of household products.  Her dreams and aspirations are to have a strong business, the ability to serve many customers and to improve her family's economic situation.

loans.use: To purchase oil, sugar, soap, pastas, bread and other household products

loans.name: Aracely Guadalupe

texts.es:
Aracely, tiene 54 años D. edad, resiD. en Jucuapa departamento D. Usulután, se dedica al destazo D. cerdos y venta D. queso, vive con su esposo y sus hijos D. 15 y 18 años D. edad; El negocio inicio cuando ella era muy joven y actualmente lo tiene en el mercado municipal D. Jucuapa, lo atienD. D. 6:00am a 4:00 todos los días.
Ella actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para comprar cerdos y queso, los cerdos para destazar y comercializar su carne y el queso igualmente, este préstamo le ayudara para adquirir lo que necesita para continuar en el negocio, y recibir ganancias para su familia.
Sus sueños en torno al negocio es crecer cada día, mejorar su mercadería y atender bien a los clientes. Con su familia espera mejorar su condición económica y estar unidos trabajando para que sus hijos tengan un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Aracely is 54 years old and lives in Jucuapa in the department of Usulután.  She butchers pigs and sells cheese for a living.  She lives with her husband and their children ages 15 and 18.  She started her business when she was very young and it is currently located in the Jucuapa town market.  She works from 6:00 am until 4:00 every day.  

She is currently requesting a loan to purchase pigs and cheese.  She will butcher the pigs and sell the meat as well as the cheese.  With this loan she will be able to purchase the things she needs to keep her business running and earn an income for her family.  Her dreams for her business are to grow every day, improve her merchandise and to give her customers good service.  She hopes to improve her family's economic situation and to work together to give her children a better future.

loans.use: To purchase pigs and cheese

loans.name: Lilia

texts.es:
La señora Lilia, reside en San Buenaventura, departamento de Usulután, tiene 64 años de edad, vive con sus hijos de 29, 26 y 18 años de edad, también vive su madre con ellos, administra un chalet donde ofrece gaseosa, churros, frutas, este negocio tiene 20 años de existir, lo atiende de lunes a domingo, por el momento es estable  y sus ganancias las utiliza para cubrir las necesidades del hogar como la alimentación y pago de servicios.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar mercadería, para abastecer el negocio, como gaseosas, jugos, churros, frutas y materiales para hacer pupusas, como chicharrón, quesillo, maíz y tomates, el préstamo le ayudara a tener variedad de productos y a preparar su venta de pupusas.
Su proyección es cada día aumentar sus ventas, mantener el chalet surtido de mercadería, atender a los clientes con los mejores productos y la mejor atención para garantizar las ventas.
texts.en:
Señora Lilia lives in San Buenaventura, in the Department Usulután.  She is 64 years old, and she lives with her children, who are 29, 26, and 18.  Also, her mother lives with them.  She runs a stall where she offers soda, churros, and fruit.  This business has been around for 20 years.  She works there from Monday to Sunday, and for the moment it is stable and she uses the earnings to cover the household needs like food and utilities.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy merchandise to stock the business, like soda, juices, churros, fruit, and ingredients to make pupusas (a local delicacy), which are chicharrón, cheese, corn, and tomatoes.  The loan will help her to have a variety of products and to get ready to sell pupusas.

Her goal is to increase her sales each day, maintain her stall stocked with merchandise, and serve clients with the best products and the best service in order to guarantee sales.

loans.use: To buy merchandise like soda, juice, fruits, and churros

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es: Marilu tiene 31 años, vive con su esposo y sus hijos en su casa propia. Desde su niñez ha desempeñado las tareas agrícolas, hoy se ha convertido en su fuente de ingresos económicos para su familia, por lo que ahora cuida de las tierras que sus padres le heredaron y de otros que tiene en unión con su esposo; ambos son cultivados y trabajados. Es entonces que las planta de papa, maíz  habas, cebollas entre otros son los productos que cosecha y comercializa en diferentes puntos de la ciudad a los comerciantes minoristas. Durante estos años de experiencia ha visto que este negocio es muy rentable y beneficioso, por los que ahora desea continuar adelante en esta actividad. Es su tercer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono para su próxima campaña de siembra.
texts.en: Marilu is 31 years old.  She lives with her husband and their children in her own home.  Since her childhood she has done agricultural work.  Now, she has become a source of income for her family as she now cares for the land that her parents left her, and the other land she holds together with her husband; they are both farmers and hard workers.  She plants potatoes, corn, and onions among others.  These are the products that she harvests and commercializes in different parts of the city to the small businesses.  During recent years she has seen that the business is very profitable and beneficial and so now she wants to continue moving ahead with this work.  This is her third loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she has financial support and she has always demonstrated that she is responsible in her payments.  Also, she is grateful to be part of the community bank because all of the members are responsible and very supportive people.  She thanks the people who will fund the loan that she is asking for and that will be very useful in the profess of her business.  With the loan she is asking for, she will invest in the purchase of bags of fertilizer for the next growing season.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Claudia Lisbeth

texts.es:
Claudia, es una joven de 23 años de edad, reside en Nueva Guadalupe, departamento de San Miguel, actualmente vive con sus padres y hermanos, es soltera y no tiene hijos, ella vende tamales de tres clases de gallina, elotes y pisques (frijoles), desde hace 4 años, realizando las ventas de lunes a sábado.
Ella por el momento necesita materiales para la preparación de estos tamales por lo que solicita un préstamo y comprar con los fondos, elotes, pollo, manteca, frijol, maíz, tomates y condimentos, este préstamo le ayudara a su negocio y a ella para que continúe vendiendo y generando ingresos para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar.
Su objetivo es ayudar a sus padres para que tengan un ingresos permanente de ella y también ahorrar su propias ganancias y en un futuro formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
Claudia is 23 years old and lives with her parents and siblings in Nueva Guadalupe, in the department of San Miguel. She is single and has no children.
For the last four years, from Monday to Saturday, she has been selling three types of tamale made from chicken, corn and "pisque" (beans). 

She currently needs ingredients to make these tamales, so she is requesting a loan in order to buy corn, chicken, butter, beans, tomatoes and seasoning. This loan will help her business and allow her to continue selling tomales and thus generate income to help her parents with the household expenses.

His goal is to provide her parents with a permanent income and also to save for her own future family.

loans.use: To buy corn, chicken, butter, beans, tomatoes and seasoning

loans.name: Odilia Yolanda

texts.es:
Odilia, es una señora de 42 años de edad, reside en Lolotique departamento de San Miguel, ella está viviendo con su esposo y sus hijos de 21 y 18 años de edad, vende pupusas y gaseosas, también churros hace 6 años inicio este negocio, trabajando de lunes a sábado.
Por el momento Odilia necesita un préstamo para compra mercadería como maíz, chicharrón, quesillo, tomates, bebida, dulces y churros, estos productos para abastecer la pupuseria y la tienda, con esta ayudara ella quiere ofrecer una variedad de productos y atender mejor las necesidades de los clientes.
Su aspiración con la inversión es administrar correctamente el negocio, y los fondos del préstamo, también que sus hijos continúen con sus estudios.
texts.en: Odilia is a 42 year old woman that lives in Lolotique in the department of San Miguel.  She live with her husband and two children ages 21 and 18.  She has been selling pupusas [thick, stuffed tortillas], soft drinks and churros [fried dough pastry] for 6 years.  She works Monday through Saturday.   Presently, Odilia needs a loan to buy corn, chicharrón [chopped pork], quesillo [soft cheese], tomatoes, beverages, sweets and churros to stock her pupuseria and store.  This will help her to offer a variety of products and better serve the needs of her customers.  Her goal is to properly manage the investment in her business and the loan funds and also, for her children continue with their studies.

loans.use: To purchase corn, chicharrón, quesillo, tomatoes, beverages, sweets and churros

loans.name: Rosa Adelina

texts.es:
Rosa D. 53 años D. edad, resiD. en Chinameca departamento D. San Miguel, vive con su esposo y tiene dos hijos D. 32 y 26 años D. edad, el menor aun vive con ella, pero el mayor ya está fuera D. la casa con su propio hogar.
Ella tiene un taller D. sastrería hace unos 12 años trabajando D. lunes a sábado, y por el momento necesita un préstamo para comprar materiales como tela, hilo, botones, ciper, esta compra es importante para el taller, ya que las telas debe tenerlas en diferentes colores y los demás materiales se le agotan rápidamente en la confección D. trajes.
Doña Rosa tiene el sueño D. ver a su hijo graduado D. la universidad, es por eso que trabaja cada día por apoyarlo y ayudarlo económicamente.
texts.en:
Rosa is 53 years old. She lives in Chinameca, departament of San Miguel. She lives with her husband and two children, aged 32 and 26. The youngest still lives with her, but the oldest is out of the house with a home of his own. 

She has had a tailoring workshop for 12 years. She works from Monday though Saturday and right now she needs a loan to buy materials such as fabric, thread, buttons and zippers.  This purchase is important for the workshop since she has to have differently colored fabrics and the other materials run out quickly when she makes clothing. 

Rosa dreams of seeing her son graduate from college. That is why she works every day to support him and help him financially.

loans.use: To buy materials: fabric, thread, buttons, zippers.

loans.name: La Retama Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “L. RETAMA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a L. provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

L. socia es L. Sra. Carmen Rosa; elL. tiene 31 años D. edad y es casado y tiene 2 Hijos; L. socia  tiene un negocio D. venta D. venta D. computadoras, elL. y su esposo tienen L. tienda donD. venden los repuestos D. L. computadora y también venD. computadoras, L. socia también es profesora del nivel inicial, L. socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio D. venta D. computadoras.  L. socia solicita el préstamo para comprar accesorios para L. computadora.

Los otros socios  se dedican a L. venta D. ropa, artesanía, servicio D. taxi, venta D. verduras y tienda D. abarrotes.

L. socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
The members belong to the "L. RETAMA"  communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which belongs to the province and department of Cuzco.    

The member is Mrs. Carmen Rosa. She is 31 years old, married and has 2 children.  Carmen has a business selling computers. She and her husband have a store where they sell computer replacement parts and computers as well. She is also a first level professor. She wants to grow and improve her business selling computers. She is asking for the loan to buy computer accesories. 

The rest of the members sell clothing, vegetables, and artisanal crafts and have a taxi service and grocery store.  

Carmen is happy about the loan and committed to making the payments.

loans.use: The member is asking for the loan to buy computer accesories.

loans.name: Aleyda Del Pilar

texts.es: Esta señora es maestra desde hace 31 años, fue directora del centro donde hoy labora que es el Instituto señor de esquipulas telica, tiene un edad de 54 años es madre de 2 hijos una mujercita que esta casada y un varon que es el que tiene a su cargo, es originaria de esta localidad de telica, sus familiares tanto paternos como maternos son reconocidos por sobresalir como artistas y como personas educadas, trabajadoras, esta señora ha trabajado con la empresa ceprodel desde el año 2003 hasta la fecha, obteniendo financiamientos tanto para desarrollo familiar y mejoramiento de vivienda el cual le ayudado a mejorar su nivel de vida y el de su familia, ha mantenido la fidelidad con la empresa en cuanto a la continuidad de sus solicitudes.
texts.en: Aleyda del Pilar has been a teacher for 31 years. She was previously the director of the school where she now works, the Señor de Esquipulas Institute in Telica. She is 54 years old and a mother of two. Her daughter is a young married woman and her son is still in her care. She is originally from Telica and both her paternal and maternal relatives are known for excelling as artists, educated individuals, and hard workers. Aleyda del Pilar has been working with Ceprodel since 2003. She has obtained loans both to help her family develop and to make improvements to their home, in order to improve the quality of life for her and her family. She has maintained the trust of the organization in regards to continuing to request loans.

loans.use: school expenses and dental work

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia tiene 39 años vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos en su casa propia. Hace más de 5 años se dedica a la venta de animales que ella misma cría y alimenta, pero previamente son comprados a un menor precio. En este negocio su esposo también es participe así que ambos trabajan juntos y recaudan buena cantidad de ganancias para sostener a sus hijos. Paralelamente a este negocio, por las tarde vende comida de manera ambulante. Ella se siente muy animada por todos los logros que ha obtenido; por ello desea incrementar la cantidad de animales que tiene. Es su crédito número 11 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará más animales como ovejas para incrementar su capital de trabajo.
texts.en: Julia is 39 and lives with her husband and 4 children in their own house.  More than 5 years ago she started selling animals that she herself raised and nourished.  In the past the animals were bought  at a lower price.  Her husband also works with her and together they  make a good living so that they can support their children.  Besides this business in the afternoons Julia sells food on the streets.  She feels very excited about all that they have managed to earn and she would like to increase the number of animals that she has.  This is the 11th loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she has financial support since she has always been responsible with her payments.  She also appreciates being part of a communal bank because all of the members are responsible and united.  She thanks the people who have offered the loan that she is requesting.   It will be very useful in her business.  Julia will use the loan to buy more animals such as sheep to increase her working capital.

loans.use: to buy more sheep

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio, reside en Lolotique departamento de San Miguel, tiene 37 años de edad, vive con su esposa y tres hijos de 12, 10 y 9 años de edad, Sergio tiene una moto taxi, con la que trabaja realizando viajes a personas que transitan por el centro de Lolotique y que desean desplazarse a otra zona, trabaja todos los días desde hace 4 años.
Él necesita un préstamo para mejorar el piso de su casa, comprando ladrillo de piso, cemento y arena, este préstamo le ayudara pues él no cuenta con los fondos para realizar la inversión, además que mejorara su condición y la de su familia.
Sus aspiraciones es continuar mejorando la vivienda, hacerla cada vez más confortable y segura, también cuidar su trabajo porque de él depende su familia y la realización de estos proyectos.
texts.en:
Sergio lives in Lolotique in the department of San Miguel. He is 37 years old and lives with his wife and three children aged 12, 10 and 9. Sergio has a motorcycle taxi, which he uses to carry passengers traveling in the center of Lolotique and to other places. He has worked every day for the last four years.

He needs a loan to improve the floor in his house; he needs to buy floor tiles, cement and sand. He does not have the funds to invest, so this loan will help him and will also improve his family's living conditions.

Sergio hopes to keep improving his home, making it increasingly more comfortable and safe. He also wants to take care of his business because both his family and these projects depend on it.

loans.use: To buy floor tiles, cement and sand

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Alicia; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de pescados, la socia vende pescados en el mercado desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de pescados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pescados al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Alicia is a member of the El Molinito II Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Alicia is 40 years old and single.  She has three children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling fish.  She sells fish in the market from 6:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  Through this business she gets her children ahead.

She wants to expand and improve her business of selling fish.  She is requesting the loan to buy fish wholesale.  She is very happy about the loan, and she pledges to make the payments in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy fish wholesale

loans.name: Fidel Angel

texts.es:
Don Fidel, tiene 69 años de edad, reside en Santa Elena departamento de Usulután, vive con dos hijas, es viudo, las hijas tiene 38 y 26 años de edad, administra un negocio de venta de lácteos, este negocio es iniciativa propia, trabaja en su propia casa, con la ayuda de sus hijas y no tiene un horario fijo para atender el negocio.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para compra de leche y materiales para elaborar productos,  esta inversión le permitirá crecer y fortalecer el negocio, ayudándole a mantenerse firme en el mercado.
Las aspiraciones de don Fidel es instalar un negocio amplio, surtido de mercadería, y que las condiciones de vida de su familia cambien.
texts.en:
Fidel, age 69, lives in Santa Elena in the Usulután department.  He is a widower, and he lives with his two daughters, ages 38 and 26.  He manages a business selling dairy products.  He has the business through his own initiative.  He works in his own house with help from his daughters.  He does not have a fixed schedule for tending to his business.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy milk and materials to make products.  This investment will strengthen his business and allow it to grow.  It will help his business to stay strong in the market. 

Fidel strives to establish a comprehensive business that is stocked with merchandise.  He also hopes that his family’s living conditions change.

loans.use: To buy milk

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria tiene 33 años, vive con su hija en casa de sus familiares. Desde hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de jugos y frutas en un local de ventas que ha arrendado en una avenida central de su barrio, desde entonces atiende todos los días y con ayuda de su pequeña hija a sus clientes, generalmente por las mañanas y las tardes. La ventaja de su negocio es que se ubica cerca de un paradero de transportes que le permite tener una clientela fija que siempre consume y esto le genera rentas que favorecen a su economía. Sus planes es obtener nuevas herramientas para mejorar su negocio. Es el primer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería en frutas y también en gaseosas.
texts.en:
Victoria is 33 years old and lives with her daughter in the house of other family members. She has been selling juice and fruit in a small rented store for three years now. The store is located on one of the main streets in her neighborhood. She works there every day of the week and her young daughter typically helps out with customers in the mornings and afternoons. Her store has the advantage of being located close to a bus stop, which provides her with a steady stream of customers. Their frequent purchases allow her to earn income and build up her savings. She plans to buy new tools in order to make some improvements to her store.

This is her first loan with MFP and she is thankful for this financial support. Moreover, she is glad to be part of her community bank because all of the bank members are responsible, supportive individuals. She would like to thank those bank members who will manage the loan she is requesting because the loan will be very helpful for the development of her business. She plans to use this loan to buy merchandise such as fruit and carbonated beverages.

loans.use: Purchase of fruit and carbonated beverages

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Benedicta; ella tiene 60 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 7 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras, la socia compra verduras del mercado de Huancaro y los vende en el mercado de el molino, la socia trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras como zanahorias, papas, arvejas entre otras verduras.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Benedicta is a member of the communal bank, El Molinito II. The bank is located in the district of Cusco in Cusco province, department of Cusco.

Benedicta is over 60 years old and is a widow with seven children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her job selling vegetables. She buys her vegetables at the Huancaro market and sells them in the El Molino market and works every day from 5:00 am until 5:00 pm. Benedicta would like to expand her vegetable selling business. She has requested this loan in order to buy vegetables such as carrots, potatoes, peas, and other vegetables.

Benedicta is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: She has requested the loan in order to buy vegetables such as carrots, potatoes, peas, and other vegetables.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es:
Doña Rosa María B. B., es trabajadora desde hace 6 años en una institución estatal, desempeñando el cargo de Conserje.

Ella es madre soltera de 49 años de edad, con un hijo a cargo de 14 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Managua en el barrio Francisco Meza desde hace 34 años.

Este es el primer crédito que solicita a CEPRODEL lo necesita para cambiar el techo de su casa, comprará 19 láminas de Zinc de 12 pie y calibre número 28, 15 perlìnes, golosos, soldadura, pintura anticorrosiva. Agradece a  CEPRODEL porque gracias a este préstamo espera pasar un invierno seco.
texts.en:
Rosa María B. B. has worked for six years now as a custodian in a state institution.

She is a 49-year-old single mother with a 14-year-old son. She has lived in the city of Managua in the neighborhood of Francisco Meza for 34 years.

This is her first time requesting a loan from CEPRODEL. She needs the loan in order to build a new roof for her house. She plans to buy nineteen 12-foot #28 size zinc metal sheets, fifteen purlins, beams, solder, and anti-corrosive paint. 

She is grateful to CEPRODEL because this loan will help her to stay dry this winter.

loans.use: House repairs, building a new roof over the kitchen

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gregoria; ella tiene 39 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de golosinas y venta de pan, la socia vende las golosinas en una carreta en forma ambulatoria y también el pan lo vende en forma ambulatoria, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de golosinas y venta de pan. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar chupetes, caramelos, chicle y pan al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gregoria, 39, is a member of the “EL MOLINITO II” (The Little Mill II) communal bank located in Cusco district which belongs to Cusco province, Cusco department.

She is married and has four children.  She alternates her daily chores with the sale of sweets and bread.  She sells her wares from a cart in an ambulatory fashion; she also sells the bread this way.  She works from 6am until 7pm and wants to expand and improve the business of sweets and bread sales.  She is asking for a loan to buy frozen fruit treats, candy, chewing gum and bread at wholesale.

She is happy about the loan and commits to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy frozen fruit treats, candy, chewing gum and bread at wholesale.

loans.name: Selvin Armando

texts.es:
Selvin de 21 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a vender sorbetes, vive con su esposa y su madre, no tiene hijos, y todos trabajan por los gastos del hogar.
El negocio de Selvin es vender sorbetes en una motocicleta, a todos los alrededores de la zona, este negocio es el que le provee los ingresos para ayudar en el hogar con los gastos. Por el momento solicita un préstamo para comprar sorbete y continuar trabajando en la motocicleta.
Selvin quiere lograr un mejor nivel en las ventas siendo mayorista y distribuir para la zona, además de aportar para su familia lo necesario para tener una mejor condición económica.
texts.en:
Selvin, 21, lives in San Rafael Oriente, San Miguel department.  He sells sorbets (ice-cream treats).  He lives with his wife and his mother; he has no children.  They all work to meet household expenses.

Selvin’s business is selling sorbets from a motorcycle throughout the neighboring area.  This   business provides the income to help meet household expenses.  For the moment he is asking for a loan to buy sorbets to continue working with his motorcycle.

Selvin wants to attain a better level of sales becoming a wholesaler for the zone.  He also wants to provide his family with everything necessary to have a better economic condition.

loans.use: To buy sorbets.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Mercedes De Gesus

texts.es: Esta señora es el primer financiamiento que obtiene con la empresa, es comerciante su negocio y para lo que solicito es para la venta de tortillas y leña, ella habita en el reparto el porvenir calle central jurisdiccion de quezalguaque, es ajuntada con un señor de aproximadamente 65 años es jubilado ella tiene 2 hijas mujeres una de ella estudia en el colegio de la comarca,  es una señora joven tiene su propia casa dicho negocio lo ejerce desde hace nueve años del cual ha logrado hacer una clientela fiel por su trato amable, varios de sus familiares incluyendo mama y hermanos viven en el mismo reparto,
texts.en: This woman is asking for her first loan for this business.  She is a businesswoman.  This business she wants the loan for is selling tortillas and firewood.  She lives at the entrance of El Provenir, Central Street, in the jurisdiction of Quezalguaque.  Her partner is a gentleman who is approximately 65 years old.  He is retired.  She has two girls, one of whom studies in the local high school.  She is a young woman who has her own home.  She has done this work for the past 9 years, and she has successfully gotten a loyal clientele due to her kind treatment.  Several of her family members including her mother and brothers live in the same area.

loans.use: To buy corn and firewood

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Graciela; ella tiene 41 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de pescados y mariscos, la socia vende en el mercado el molino desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de mariscos y pescados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pescados y mariscos.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Graciela is a member of the communal bank, El Molinito II. The bank is located in the Cusco district of the province of Cusco, Cusco department.

Graciela is a 41-year-old single mother of four. She divides her time between her daily activities and her work selling fish and shellfish at the El Molino market. She works from 7:00 am until 7:00 pm. This work allows her to provide for her children. Graciela would like to expand and improve her fish and shellfish business. She has requested the loan in order to buy fish and shellfish.

Graciela is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: She has requested the loan in order to purchase fish and shellfish.

loans.name: Luis Jhonathan

texts.es: Luis es soltero tiene 21 años de edad vive en casa de su tia ubicada en la calle Santa Isabel el se inicio como chofer de manera dependiente aproximadamente tres años actualmente cuenta con dos mototaxis propias la cual una trabaja el de forma independiente y la otra da en alquiler el financiamiento otorgado sera destinado para el mantenimiento y reforzamiento de su dos mototaxis, se le otorga el financiamiento por contar con buenas referencias,voluntad y capacidad de pago.
texts.en:
Luis, 21, is single and lives in his aunt’s house located on Santa Isabel Street.  He started out as an independent driver about three years ago.  

He has two mototaxis of his own.  He works one of them independently and leases out the other one.  The requested loan will be used for vehicle maintenance and repair of his two mototaxis

The loan is granted because he has good references as well as the will and capacity to repay.

loans.use: For vehicle maintenance and repair.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reina, de 29 años de edad, reside en Santa Elena departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de las edades de 17 y 5 años, son dependientes económicamente, Reina tiene un negocio donde ofrece productos de uso personal, por el momento necesita invertir por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería, como peluches, y accesorios , entre otros que a diario le solicitan los clientes.
Reina tiene ubicado el negocio en su casa, por lo que no tiene un horario fijo para atenderlo, este préstamo le dará la firmeza de tener a disponibilidad de los clientes todo lo necesario para el hogar.
Sus aspiraciones son crecer en el negocio, desarrollarse como comerciante y velar por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Reina, 29, lives in Santa Elena, Usulután department, with her husband and two children who are 17 and 5 years of age.  They are economically dependent. 

Reina has a business selling personal use items.  For the moment she needs to invest so is asking for a loan to buy merchandise like stuffed toys and accessories, among others, that her customers request daily.

Reina’s business is in her house so she does not have a fixed work schedule.  This loan will provide her with a sure way to have everything her customers need for the home.

Her dreams are to grow in business, to develop as a merchant and to watch over her family’s wellbeing.

loans.use: To buy merchndise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Home improvement purchases

loans.name: Mencia

texts.es: Mencia tiene 38 años, vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos en una casa alquilada. Vende comida típica de su tierra natal, en este caso, anticuchos y lo hace de manera ambulante. Es entonces desde la esquina de su casa y a partir de las tardes hasta altas horas de la noche, siendo este trabajo continúo por casi 4 años. Ella considera que este negocio es una buena opción de desarrollo que la ayudó en tiempos de necesidad económica y que actualmente la ayuda a sostener  a sus hijos. Hoy sus platillos se venden rápidamente, siendo esta la razón  por el cual desea adquirir nuevos implementos que la ayudarán a vender con mayor  frecuencia. Es su segundo crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más ingredientes  para su negocio.
texts.en:
Mencia, 38, lives with her husband and four children in a rented house.  She sells food typical of her birthplace, in this case, anticuchos (skewered roasted meat), in an ambulatory fashion from the corner near her house starting in the afternoon and continuing until very late at night.  She has worked at this continuously for almost four years.

She considers this business to be a good option for development in that it helped her out during times of economic need and it currently helps her support her children.  Today, her dishes sell out quickly.  For this reason she wants to acquire new tools that will help her sell more.

This is her second loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she can count on financial support because she has always been responsible with her payments.  Besides, she enjoys being part of a communal bank because all its members are responsible, mutually supportive people.

She thanks all those people who will fund the loan she is asking for which will be very useful for her business’ progress.  She will use the requested loan to buy more ingredients for her business.

loans.use: To buy tools and ingredients that will help her stay in business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To invest it in a business he has in the market.

loans.name: Felipe Antonio

texts.es: Este señor es maestro desde hace 10 años, esta ubicado en el colegio german pomares ordoñez de la comarca cristo rey  jurisdiccion de quezalguaque, es casado le tienen 2 hijos, estan pequeños estudian en los colegios de la localidad misma de telica, es originario de este municipio de telica ,es el primer credito que tiene con la empresa atravez del convenio firmado con dicho colegio, del cual estan siendo beneficiado otros compañeros de trabajo, dicho financiamiento lo utilizara en el mejoramiento de vivienda
texts.en:
This man has been a Teacher for ten years.  He is employed at the German Pomares Ordoñez School in Cristo Rey, Quezalguaque.

He’s married and has two children.  They are little and are enrolled in local schools in Telica, which is where he’s from.

This is his first loan with the firm through an agreement signed with said school in which several other coworkers are being benefitted.  He will use the financing for home improvements.

loans.use: To buy building materials, cement and sand, transportation and labor costs for home improvement.

loans.name: Mary

texts.es: Mary tiene 30 años, vive con sus 2 hijas en casa de su suegra. Hace más de 3 años se dedica a la costura de cubrecamas, almohadones y colchas, prendas que ella misma elabora con diversos y novedosos diseños. Es entonces que todos los días en su taller de confecciones, negocio que acondicionó en el interior de su casa. Las prendas que  confecciona son ofrecidas a personas conocidas, así como a las tiendas aledañas de su casa,  donde venden artículos para el hogar. De esta manera logra obtener ganancias considerables, y eso satisface sus expectativas y su economía, por tanto espera mejorar su taller y tener mas capital de trabajo. Es su cuarto crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más telas y demás materiales que necesita para la elaboración de colchas, cubrecamas y almohadones.
texts.en:
Mary, 30, lives with her two daughters in her mother-in-law’s house.  For over three years she has been making bedspreads, large bed cushions and comforters, items she makes herself with diverse, original designs.

She set up a sewing workshop at home where she works every day.  The items she makes are then offered to acquaintances as well as to the local stores near her house where items for the home are sold.  This way she obtains considerable profits that meet her economic expectations.  She hopes to improve her workshop and have more working capital.

This is her fourth loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she has financial support because she’s always been responsible with her payments.  In addition, she enjoys being part of her communal bank because all its members are responsible and mutually supportive people.

She thanks all the people who will fund the loan she’s requesting that will be very useful for her business’ progress.  She will use the requested funds to buy more fabric and other materials she needs to make the bedspreads, comforters and large cushions.

loans.use: To buy fabric and materials for the manufacture of bedspreads, comforters and pillows.

loans.name: Ketty

texts.es: Ketty tiene  20 años, vive con sus padres en una casa arrendada. Desde hace 1 año se dedica a trabajar de manera independiente en la venta de cosméticos que ofrece a las personas  que conoce  dentro de su actual centro laboral  y en su mismo barrio. Los productos que ofrece son de marcas reconocidas, y siempre lleva a la mano catálogos y pequeñas muestras que son ofrecidos a sus clientes para que rápidamente puedan elegir el producto que deseen. Considera que este trabajo requiere de mucha inteligencia y persuasión para tener una venta exitosa que la  beneficie. En adelante desea mejorar sus ventas y aumentar su capital de trabajo. Es su primer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más cosméticos y con una parte en el pago de un terreno que esta por adquirir.
texts.en: Ketty is 20 years old and she lives with her parents in a house that is rented. For the past year she has been selling cosmetics independently, offering them for sale to individuals that she knows in a business area in her community. The products that she sells are of well known brand names and she always has catalogues and samples at her disposal to give to clients in order to help them choose the products they want. She estimates that this type of work requires intelligence and persuasion in order to have a good volume of sales. IN the future she wants to improve her sales and to increase her working capital. This is her first loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is very happy to have this financial support. She also enjoys taking part of her communal bank because all of the other members are responsible and team oriented. She is thankful to all those individuals who will contribute to the loan she requests. It will be very helpful to the progress of her business. The loan that she requests will be invested in the purchase of cosmetics and a part will be used to pay for a plot of land she wants to buy.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rufina; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, la socia prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, la socia atiende desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6.00 p.m y por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar el local de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar el restaurant.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rufina, 40, is a member of the “EL MOLINITO II” (The Little Mill II) communal bank located in Cusco district which belongs to Cusco province, Cusco department.

She has a live-in spouse and four children.  She alternates her daily chores with a restaurant business.  She prepares breakfasts, lunches and dinners.  She is open for business from 7am until 6pm and this business makes it possible for her to support her children.  She wants to improve the restaurant’s site and is asking for a loan to equip the restaurant.

She is happy about the loan and commits to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To equip the restaurant.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Guillermo; el tiene 45 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, el socio también se dedica al transporte, el es chofer de servicio público, el socio trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m y la tienda de abarrotes trabaja su esposa, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, azúcar y leche para la tienda de abarrotes.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Guillermo, 45, is a member of the “EL MOLINITO II” (The Little Mill II) communal bank located in Cusco district which belongs to Cusco province, Cusco department.

He has a live-in spouse and three children.  He alternates his daily chores with a grocery business.  He also is in transportation; he’s a driver in public transportation service.  He works from 7am until 9pm and the grocery store is tended to by his wife.  He wants to expand the grocery store and is asking for a loan to buy products like rice, sugar and milk for the grocery store.

He is happy about the loan and commits to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy products like rice, sugar and milk for his grocery store.

El  socio solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank El Molinito II.The bank is located in the Cusco district, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is named Sr. Elio; he is 33 years old and single; he alternates his daily activities with the transportation business. He uses his car for a taxi service from 7:00 am until 10:00 pm in the different streets of the city of Cusco. The member wants to improve his taxi services. He is asking for this loan so that he can maintain his car. 

He is excited about this loan and promises to follow through with the loan payments.

loans.use: The member is asking for a loan for the maintenance of his car.

loans.name: Luz Marina

Luz Marina; ella tiene 33 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, la socia tiene un carro que maneja su pareja y hace servicio de taxi y ella es ama de casa, la socia quiere mejorar el servicio de taxi. La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.

Her daily activities include running a transportation business, she has a car that her husband drives to provide taxi service. She is a housewife. She wants to improve the taxi service. The member is requesting this loan for car maintenance.

The member is happy to get the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: Car maintenance

loans.name: Erika

La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

Erika; ella tiene 25 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, ella es propietaria de 4 carros que hacen servicio de taxi y ella administra este negocio, por medio de este negocio la socia quiere ahorrar, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de servicio de taxi. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos para los carros.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to El Molinito II Community Bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member is Erika; she is 25 years old and is single. She combines her daily activities with a transportation business. She is the proprietor of four cars that provide taxi service, and she runs the business. Through this business, she wants to save money. The member wants to grow and improve the taxi service. The member is requesting this loan to purchase parts for the cars.

The member is happy to get the loan and promises to maker her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase car parts

loans.name: Ruth Aidee

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ruth Aidee; ella tiene 31 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de hielos, ella tiene una proveedora donde vende hielo para diferentes negocios como bares y restaurants, ella trabaja dese las 6:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m y por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de hielo. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar una congeladora para el negocio de venta de hielo.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to El Molinito II Community Bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member is Ruth Aidee; she is 31 years old and is married with three children. She combines her daily activities with the ice sales business. She has a supply shop where she sells ice for different businesses such as bars and restaurants. She works from 6 am to 7 pm, and through this business, she helps her children succeed. The member wants to grow and improve her ice sales business. The member is requesting this loan to purchase a freezer for the ice sales business.

The member is happy to get this loan and promises to maker her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase a freezer for her ice sales business

loans.name: Edis

texts.es: Edis tiene 32 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en casa alquilada. Desde hace 5 años  realiza la venta de jugos de frutas de manera ambulante, tiene sus disposición su esencial herramienta de trabajo que es su carrito de ventas donde tiene la facilidad de trasladarse a distintos puntos de ventas cercanos a su barrio. También ofrece por la tarde bebida caliente como café o mate que son del agrado de su público consumidor. Este trabajo  es rentable para Edis y es por esta razón que se ha mantenido durante este tiempo con la mentalidad de mejorar y agrandar su negocio. Es su primer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá para comprar una licuadora, extractora y abastecerse de frutas.
texts.en: Edis is 32 years old. She lives with her husband and two children in a rental home. For five years she has been selling fruit juice from a stand. She has the essential tool for her work, which is her little sales stand that she can take to different places around her neighborhood to make sales. In the afternoon she also sells hot beverages such as coffee or mate (tea), which the public loves. This work is profitable for Edis, and that is why she has kept it up all this time with the hope of improving and growing her business. This is her first loan with Kiva partner MFP; she is very happy to know that she has financial help. Plus, she is grateful to be part of her community bank because all the members are responsible people who are very loyal. Thanks to the people who will be lenders for this loan; it will be very useful for her business's progress. With the loan she is requesting, she will purchase a juicer, extractor, and fruit.

loans.use: Purchase a juicer, extractor, and fruit

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria Teresa; ella tiene 48 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, la socia también trabaja en una empresa de transportes vendiendo boletos, la socia tiene el negocio de restaurant donde prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, carne y verduras para el restaurant.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to El Molinito II Community Bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Maria Teresa; she is 48 years old, married with four children. The member combines her daily activities with her restaurant. She also works for a transportation company selling tickets. The member has her restaurant where she prepares breakfast, lunch, and dinner. She wants to grow and improve the restaurant. The member is requesting this loan to purchase ingredients for cooking such as rice, meat, and vegetables for the restaurant.

The member is happy to get this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for cooking such as rice, meat, and vegetables for the restaurant

loans.name: Maritza Elizabeth

texts.es:
L. socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a L. provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

L. socia es L. Sra. Maritza Elizabeth; elL. tiene 23 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; L. socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. transporte, elL. tiene un carro que hace servicio D. taxi, su esposo es el que trabaja en este negocio y elL. es cobradora D. servicio urbano en una combi, L. socia quiere mejorar el negocio D. transporte. L. socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento D. su carro.

 L. socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "El Molinito II". The bank is located in the Cusco district, which is in the province and department of Cusco.
The member's name is Maritza. She is 23 years old, married, and has one child. She alternates her household work with a transportation business. She has a car that she puts to service as a taxi. Her husband drives the taxi for her business and she is also the fare-collector in an urban mini-van taxi service. The member wants to improve her transportation business and so she is requesting a loan for the maintenance of her car.
The member is happy to have the loan and promises to abiD. by the repayment scheme.

loans.use: To maintain her taxi.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

Yolanda; ella tiene 36 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos entre otros, la socia atiende desde las 6:00 a.m hasta 10:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "El Molinito II". The bank is located in the Cusco district, which is in the province and department of Cusco.
The member's name is Yolanda. She is 36 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children. She alternates her household work with a business running a grocery store. She sells staple goods such as rice, sugar, noodles, and others. The member works from 6:00am until 10:00pm. She wants to expand and improve her grocery store so she is requesting a loan to buy supplies for the business.
The member is happy to have the loan and promises to abide by the repayment scheme.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To build iron doors and a kitchen roof.

loans.name: Hugo Roberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL MOLINITO II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Hugo Roberto; el tiene 44 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de hospedaje, el es propietario de un negocio de hospedaje que trabaja desde las 5:00 hasta las 7:00 p.m, el socio tiene un hospedaje donde llegan extranjero nacionales e internacionales, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el hospedaje. El  socio solicita el préstamo para implementar el hospedaje.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
